snippet: Coach Jason Kidd has an eye on the playoffs next spring as he limits the minutes of his veterans and experiments with players’ roles.
abstract: Off The Dribble column holds that Brooklyn Nets coach Jason Kidd is taking the long view on his team's success, limiting minutes of his veterans and experimenting with players' roles with an eye getting Nets to playoffs.
lead_paragraph: Coach Jason Kidd has an eye on the playoffs next spring as he limits the minutes of his veterans and experiments with players’ roles.

headline.main: To Win Now, Nets Take Time to Learn What Works
headline.print_headline: After Taking Their Time, Nets Begin Pushing the Pace
